subject: Basketball
Athletics and Sports
Philanthropy
lead_paragraph: Ron Artest and the Sacramento Kings has had his share of trouble with the league, and the law, but has been turning things around. Monday he’ll be participating in a charity event to help the needy of Queens, N.Y.
